Figure_1_Methodology_Comparison.png.title: Methodological Evolution in Extra-Dimensional Searches
Figure_1_Methodology_Comparison.png.description: Four-panel comparison showing (a) traditional selective analysis with confirmation bias, (b) population-based approach using all 65 events, (c) random experiment validation framework, and (d) statistical improvement quantification

Figure_2_Klein_Theory.png.title: Klein Bottle Theoretical Framework
Figure_2_Klein_Theory.png.description: Theoretical foundation showing (a) Klein bottle topology visualization, (b) mathematical identification conditions, (c) mode suppression mechanism for even/odd harmonics, (d) 5D gravitational wave propagation geometry

Figure_3_Population_Overview.png.title: LIGO-Virgo Event Population Overview
Figure_3_Population_Overview.png.description: Population characteristics showing (a) mass-distance distribution with selection criteria, (b) network SNR distribution, (c) temporal timeline of 65 events, (d) theoretical detection efficiency mapping

Figure_4_Optimization_Results.png.title: Population-Wide Parameter Optimization Results
Figure_4_Optimization_Results.png.description: Optimization outcomes showing (a) likelihood surface convergence, (b) parameter correlation matrix, (c) cross-validation stability, (d) comparison with literature values

Figure_5_Random_Framework.png.title: Random Experiment Statistical Framework
Figure_5_Random_Framework.png.description: Bias-free validation showing (a) random sampling schematic, (b) detection rate distribution across 100 experiments, (c) significance distribution with 2.80σ mean, (d) null hypothesis rejection analysis

Figure_6_Klein_Parameters.png.title: Optimized Klein Bottle Parameters and Predictions
Figure_6_Klein_Parameters.png.description: Parameter results showing (a) mass-dependent echo time scaling law, (b) frequency spectrum with 6.65 Hz fundamental, (c) Klein bottle spatial geometry, (d) coupling strength visualization

Figure_7_Event_Detections.png.title: Individual Event Echo Detections
Figure_7_Event_Detections.png.description: Detection evidence showing (a) time-frequency spectrograms for 3 detected events, (b) matched filter SNR time series, (c) significance for all 65 events, (d) timing precision analysis

Figure_8_Random_Results.png.title: Random Experiment Statistical Results
Figure_8_Random_Results.png.description: Statistical outcomes showing (a) individual significance distribution, (b) combined significance using Fisher method, (c) detection rate comparison with null, (d) null hypothesis rejection with p<0.0001

Figure_9_Significance_Analysis.png.title: Comprehensive Statistical Significance Analysis
Figure_9_Significance_Analysis.png.description: Significance assessment showing (a) significance hierarchy from individual to combined, (b) p-value distributions, (c) effect size analysis with Cohen's d, (d) statistical power validation

Figure_10_Theory_Implications.png.description: Physics implications showing (a) dimensional hierarchy with macroscopic 5th dimension, (b) spacetime topology schematic, (c) gravitational wave 5D propagation, (d) coupling strength diagram

Figure_11_Future_Predictions.png.description: Future prospects showing (a) projected O4 significance increase, (b) third-generation detector capabilities, (c) cosmological redshift evolution, (d) laboratory test predictions
